Class
Description
CommandManager
Manages and executes subcommands for a Bukkit plugin.
CreateCommand
Subcommand to initiate the process of creating a quest in the game.

DatabaseWrapper
 
Economy
Represents an economy profile associated with a player, containing information about their balance.

ListenerClass
Listens to player chat events to handle quest creation process through chat messages.
msg
Utility class for handling messaging functionalities within the plugin.
Playlegendquests
PlayLegendQuests plugin - Submission for task "PlayLegend.net - Quest System [03.01.24]".
Quest
Represents a quest in the game, encapsulating its unique identifier, name, description, reward in coins, and an item rewarded upon completion.
